kk¶

class sharp_modules.kk.kk[source]¶

Useful constants called by other radiobs classes as kk.constant

tablefy(tablename, columns, columnames)[source]¶

Print pretty table out of array of columnames and columns INPUT

tablename : name of outputable column: array with data of columns, shape (len(columnames),data) columnames: list of names of columns
OUTPUT
x: table in txt format in tablename file
RETURN
x: table in PrettyTable format
